awd_titl_txt: Undergraduate Research in Particulate Systems Engineering
awd_abstract_narration: Ten undergraduate students participate in research for a 10.week                                                                                                period. The area of research is associated with that being                                                                                                      conducted in the university's Particulate Systems Research                                                                                                      Center.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         The research fundamental aerosol mechanics is essential to                                                                                                      advances in understanding in basic and applied science and                                                                                                      engineering where transport and control of fine particulates is                                                                                                 important; such as, in combustion, atmospheric sciences, nuclear                                                                                                winter, nuclear reactor safety, and materials manufacturing.                                                                                                    Nine faculty members are associated with this project; no more                                                                                                  than two undergraduate students are assigned to each faculty                                                                                                    member.  The program will stand along with the university's                                                                                                     engineering honors program.
org_div_long_name: Office of Emerging Frontiers in Research and Innovation (EFRI)
